titleStmt.title: The constancy of true loue, or. An excellent relation of the vntimely death of tvvo faithfull louers To the tune of Downe by a forrest.

publicationStmt.publisher: for Francis Coules and are to be sould at his shop in the Old-Bayly,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "In that faire fragrant month of May,".
In two parts; woodcut illustrations at head of each part.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
